overview: Pop singer Mima Kirigow looks forward to a bright new career when she quits her chart-topping trio to become an actress. When she lands a role in a sexually charged murder mystery, Mima’s life begins to fall apart.
tagline: The color of illusion is Perfect Blue.
cast: Junko Iwao|Rica Matsumoto|Shiho Niiyama|Masaaki Okura|Shinpachi Tsuji
